com.mingsoft.cms.action.web

类 ArticleAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mingsoft.base.action.BaseAction
      • com.mingsoft.basic.action.BaseAction
        • com.mingsoft.cms.action.web.ArticleAction

  • @Controller(value="jsonApiArticle")
@RequestMapping(value="/mcms/article")
public class ArticleAction
extends com.mingsoft.basic.action.BaseAction

    铭飞科技

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2014 - 2015

    作者:
    王天培 QQ:78750478

    Comments: 前段文章控制，如果标签不能满足可以使用这个控制来满足用户的查询文章需求，主要是通过ajax返回json数据格式

    Create Date:2014-10-15

    Modification history:

    • 方法详细资料

      • detail

        @RequestMapping(value="/{basicId}/detail")
@ResponseBody
public void detail(@PathVariable
                                      int basicId,
                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        文章信息
        参数:
        basicId - 文章编号
        返回

        {"basicCategoryId":分类编号,basicTitle :"标题",basicDescription:"描述",basicThumbnails:"缩略图", basicDateTime:"发布时间",basicUpdateTime:"更新时间","basicHit":点击数, "basicId":编号 articleContent:"文章内容","basicSort":排序,[自定义模型字段]}

      • list

        @RequestMapping(value="/list",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public void list(@ModelAttribute
                                    ArticleEntity article,
                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        文章列表信息
        参数:
        pageSize - 一页显示数量
        pageNo - 当前页码
        basicCategoryId - 分类编号
        返回

        {count:"记录总数", list: "[{basicTitle:"标题",basicDescription:"描述",basicThumbnails:"缩略图",basicDateTime:"发布时间",basicUpdateTime:"更新时间","basicHit":点击数,"basicId":编号}]" }
